name: discord AI chatbots
description: using NovelAI's API, I created AI chatbots for Discord. they're not perfect, but I sure learned a lot of new things while making them

name: zodiac calculator
description: a simple zodiac calculator, using plain HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. I made it since my friends had it as a school project, even though I wasn't classmates with them and no one probably knows it exists

name: second website
description: after learning a bit of HTML and CSS properly, I went ahead and tried making a new and improved version of my old one, all with responsive design. I never finished it though, since found out about React and Expressjs

name: first website
description: I built this website without any prior knowledge to HTML or CSS, just JavaScript. I brute forced my way with ChatGPT. it's kind of terrible, but it's my first anyway
